org.wicketstuff.event.annotation

Annotation Type OnEvent


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface OnEvent
    Annotation used to tag methods that should be called by AnnotationEventDispatcher to handle the events. The methods should be public and take exactly one parameter. The method will be called only if the event payload type matches the method's parameter type.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean stop
      Whether to stop further broadcast of this event.
      Class<?>[] types
      Optional classes related to the event which may be use to distinguish methods for event handling purposes.

    • Element Detail

      • stop

        public abstract boolean stop
        Whether to stop further broadcast of this event. Left unspecified it defaults to false.
        Returns:
        whether to stop further broadcast of this event
        Default:
        false

      • types

        public abstract Class<?>[] types
        Optional classes related to the event which may be use to distinguish methods for event handling purposes.
        Returns:
        generic classes in the event
        Default:
        {}
